1.16.2.1.0.1: Ported to the latest forge version to fix rendering issues (tooltips, player models transparent, etc)
1.16.2.1.1.0: Fixed compatiblity crashed caused by breaking changes in the latest forge/JEI (suggested now is forge_version=33.0.61 and jei_version=7.3.2.25).  Patched bug in native VoxelShape class for joining server lag.  Regular Network Cables no longer visually appear to connect to inventories.
